name: If I can’t get the iMac to recover, thinking I’ll just run Plex Media Server on the Synology. It’s not a powerful NAS and won’t support transcoding. Hopefully it’ll be good enough for home usage. I have a powerful cloud server mirror that I can use if I need transcoding.
